article:
Once upon a time, the colors of the world argued.
Green said, "Clearly I am the most important.I am the sign of _ and hope.I am the color of grass, trees and leaves. _ me, all animals would die." _ said loudly."What is the color of the sky and the sea? Isn't water the most important thing for life?" Yellow laughed, "I bring laughter, happiness and warmth into the world.Every time people look at a _ , they start to smile.Without me there would be no fun." Orange said at the top of his voice, "I am the color of health and strength.Think of carrots, pumpkins and oranges.When I fill the sky at _ or sunset, everyone is _ at my beauty." Red could _ it no longer, so he shouted, "I an the color of danger and bravery.I give people courage."The colors went on _ .Their voices became louder and louder.The thunder got angry and the _ started to pour.When the colors began to cool, the rain said, "You foolish colors! Don't you know that each of you is special? _ hands and follow me." They did what they were told and together made the most beautiful rainbow .
